homePage.name: Academy Mindcept Vision
homePage.aboutTitle: We are a digital marketing agency specializing in providing comprehensive services: ASO, SEO, SMM promotion, PPC advertising, coaching, website development, and UX/UI design.
homePage.homeTitle: Development, coaching, and promotion of websites and brands: individual approach, personalized solutions, continuous support – the key to your digital success!
homePage.textForm: We will offer customized solutions for your business based on a detailed analysis of the project and the specifics of the company.
homePage.aboutText: Development, coaching, and promotion of websites and brands: individual approach, personalized solutions, continuous support — the key to your digital success!

about.aboutTitle: We are a professional marketing team specializing in creating customized solutions to increase your business profitability and strengthen your brand recognition.
about.aboutText: With extensive experience in internet marketing and web development, we know how to satisfy even the most demanding clients by offering personalized solutions.

portfolio.imageTitle: Explore our successful projects in web development and marketing in our portfolio!

homeCards.name: WEB
homeCards.description: Expert development and creation of turnkey sales websites:

details.title: Landing Page
details.description: We develop sales landing pages that help improve the quality of your leads, increase turnover, and maximize profit.

details.title: Corporate Websites
details.description: We create stylish branded websites with a user-friendly interface tailored to the needs and goals of your company.

details.title: Online Stores
details.description: Our team offers comprehensive services for the development of online stores. We will create a unique online store for your company.

details.title: Personal Solutions
details.description: We also provide custom solutions, starting from redesigning an existing website to developing a web site based on special requirements.

homeCards.name: SEO
homeCards.description: Optimization and promotion of the site to the TOP of search engine results:

details.title: Local SEO
details.description: Increasing the quality and quantity of organic traffic to your website through comprehensive promotion in Google's local search results.

details.title: Google
details.description: A set of measures for internal and external optimization to increase the ranking and visibility of the site in Google search results.

details.title: Bing
details.description: Significant improvement in site positions in Bing search results and a guarantee of an increase in the flow of target audience for your business.

homeCards.name: SMM
homeCards.description: Comprehensive marketing and promotion on social networks:

details.title: Facebook
details.description: Our specialists will develop an effective strategy for promoting your brand on Facebook, set up advertising, create and implement a content strategy.

details.title: Instagram
details.description: We create and promote unique text and video content on Instagram, which will increase the recognition of your brand and customer loyalty.

details.title: LinkedIn
details.description: We will conduct a professional presentation of your company on LinkedIn, create a business account, fill it with content, and set up advertising campaigns.

details.title: YouTube
details.description: We will help develop your channel by creating a unique image and style. We will also take care of promoting your videos and attracting traffic to your site/profile on social networks.

homeCards.name: COACH
homeCards.description: We offer individual and group coaching sessions for professional and personal growth:

details.title: SMART Goals Method
details.description: Used to define clear and measurable goals that provide a structured approach to achieving tasks.

details.title: Coaching Through Questions
details.description: A coaching technique that uses targeted questions to help clients understand and achieve their goals.

details.title: GROW Model
details.description: A popular coaching method that helps clients define their Goals, explore Reality, choose Options, and determine What's next.

aboutCards.name: Innovative
aboutCards.description: We offer advanced solutions that set new standards in the industry and promote technological progress.

aboutCards.name: Creative
aboutCards.description: Our approaches combine creativity and innovation to turn unique ideas into reality.

aboutCards.name: Reliable
aboutCards.description: We have established ourselves as a reliable partner, ensuring stability and quality at all stages of cooperation.

aboutCards.name: United
aboutCards.description: Our team builds strong relationships, working together to achieve common goals efficiently.

advantageCards.title: Global Vision, Local Solutions
advantageCards.description: We combine global trends with local knowledge to create marketing strategies that work for your market and are aimed at achieving maximum results for your business.

advantageCards.title: Flexibility and Adaptability
advantageCards.description: In the world of IT, changes happen instantaneously. We adapt to these changes by offering flexible solutions that can evolve with your business needs.

advantageCards.title: Transparency and Accountability
advantageCards.description: We value transparency in our work. Our detailed reports and regular updates allow you to track every step of the advancement and optimization of your IT campaigns.

advantageCards.title: Specialized Team of Experts
advantageCards.description: We thoroughly study the needs and features of your business. We develop unique solutions that meet your specific requirements, ensuring high-level execution and support at every stage of the project.

advantageCards.title: Responsiveness
advantageCards.description: In the IT sector, time is money. We guarantee a quick launch and setup of campaigns so you can swiftly respond to market opportunities and threats.

advantageCards.title: Data Protection
advantageCards.description: Your data is our priority. We employ the latest technologies to ensure its security and confidentiality. Your information will remain strictly confidential and will not be shared without your prior consent.

advantageCards.title: Innovation in Action
advantageCards.description: We not only keep up with new technologies and trends, but also actively implement them in our strategies to provide you with a competitive edge.

advantageCards.title: Client-Centric
advantageCards.description: We build long-term partnerships with our clients, based on trust and mutual understanding. Your success is our success.

aboutHomePage.title: Personalized IT Strategies
aboutHomePage.description: Instead of standard templates, we offer personalized strategies tailored specifically to your business and goals.

aboutHomePage.title: Comprehensive Approaches
aboutHomePage.description: We provide a full range of services from development to implementation and result analysis, ensuring continuous improvement of your marketing efforts.

aboutHomePage.title: Expert Analytics
aboutHomePage.description: Our analytical tools and methods allow you to get a clear picture of campaign effectiveness and direct efforts towards maximizing results.

aboutHomePage.title: Efficient Communication
aboutHomePage.description: We value your time and offer simple and convenient ways of communication for promptly addressing any questions and issues.

stagesWork.title: Development Research
stagesWork.description: We conduct preliminary research to determine the client's needs and the specifics of the business.

stagesWork.title: Design
stagesWork.description: Our designers create a project prototype and then discuss it with the client. After approval, the development process begins.

stagesWork.title: Web Development
stagesWork.description: Developers build the entire blog system, writing code using the chosen programming language, method, and methodology.

stagesWork.title: Marketing Planning
stagesWork.description: We conduct marketing research, plan the project stages, define the strategy, and determine the marketing channels.

stagesWork.title: Launch
stagesWork.description: Our team creates content for advertising campaigns, writes ads for the selected marketing channels. After that, we launch the advertising campaigns.

stagesWork.title: Monitoring
stagesWork.description: We monitor the advertising performance, improve it, make additional adjustments to reach more target audiences and ensure maximum revenue for the clients.

moreAboutProject.title: Website Development for a Financial Company
moreAboutProject.titleDetails: We created a corporate website for Roundsec, focusing on the sale of advanced information security and high-tech solutions. The project stands out for its innovative and reliable custom functionality.
